benchmark_details.name: PEDANTIC (Patent Definite Examination Dataset)
benchmark_details.overview: PEDANTIC is a novel dataset of 14,000 US patent claims relating to Natural Language Processing, annotated with reasons for indefiniteness to facilitate automatic examination of patent claims.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enable reproducible research on automatic patent definiteness examination.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on model predictions compared to human examiner's rejections.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate a better performance in identifying definiteness in patent claims.
methodology.baseline_results: Best model achieved an AUROC score of 60.3.
methodology.validation: Human validation using a sample of annotated claims.
